name: Paper Platformer
description:
A precision platformer where all art & animation was drawn on paper!


Features:
  • Pen sketch Art Style
  • Platforming action where the difficulty can go anywhere from Super Mario to Hollow Knight's Path of Pain
  • A Save System that was absolutely necessary for the game
  • 3+1 levels (maaaybe more in the future?)
Known Bugs:
  • Load Slot "Highest stage text" sometimes shows 2-3 but currently there isn't a Stage 2-3
  • When clicking a button in the yes/no dialog window, the window might disappear without doing anything, especially in the case of quitting the game (Not sure if this happens to anybody other than me)
Making of:
